thread.title: Athletic director at girls school arrested in Ga. prostitution sting
thread.title_full: Athletic director at girls school arrested in Ga. prostitution sting

author: Steve Burns
title: Athletic director at girls school arrested in Ga. prostitution sting
text:
The athletic director of a girls preparatory school in Chattanooga, Tenn., has been “temporarily relieved of his duties” after he was arrested in a North Georgia prostitution sting, according to a media report.
Stacey Gene Hill, 59, was one of eight men arrested Wednesday night in Dalton, according to multiple media reports. Police used an undercover officer in the sting.
Hill has worked at Girls Preparatory School for decades, the Chattanooga Times Free Press reported.
"At the present time, this is a legal matter between Mr. Hill and the Dalton, GA authorities, and it would not be appropriate for GPS to comment further," the school said in a statement.
Hill and the others arrested were charged with pandering, a misdemeanor, police said.
Read more of the story here.
In other news:
Tara Grinstead vanished in 2005.
